sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: As a reminder, many European countries have started to send these German-made tanks after Berlin reluctantly approved their transfer back in February last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But certain social media users like this one have been sharing misleading claims that the newly arrived Leopard 2 tanks were captured by the Russian army after being stuck in Ukrainian mud.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And many on Twitter, like this one, have criticized the West, saying that these tanks aren't suitable for Ukrainian terrain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And here's the video that's decided to take a closer look at these posts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The first thing that we did is take this screen capture from the video, and we did a reverse image search, and we found the original video on Instagram.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It was posted in April 2022, so that's long before the West even agreed on sending Leopard 2s to Ukraine, which only happened last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And it was posted by the Wartofta tank company, which is part of the Skaraborgs regiment of the Swedish armed forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And the team's primary goal is to train soldiers in ground combat and internationally and locally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The post translated caption reads, sometimes things don't go as planned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Being heavy is not always an advantage. The post translated caption reads, It was filmed in Slevakra, a village in southern Sweden, located about 35 kilometers away from the city of Malmö.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But are the tanks in this video even Leopard 2s?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Well, if you look closer at the hashtag in the caption, it says they are STRV.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So that means Stridsvagn 122.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And they're quite similar to the Leopard 2 tanks because they're based on the German model but adapted to Sweden's needs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So the video that you saw here on the Twitter post are completely outdated and unrelated to Ukraine.
